title: Optical two-way time and frequency transfer over free space
title_cn: 光在自由空间上的双向时间和频率传输
abstract: The transfer of high-quality time–frequency signals between remote locations underpins many applications, including precision navigation and timing, clock-based geodesy, long-baseline interferometry, coherent radar arrays, tests of general relativity and fundamental constants, and future redefinition of the second. However, present microwave-based time–frequency transfer is inadequate for state-of-the-art optical clocks and oscillators that have femtosecond-level timing jitter and accuracies below 1 × 10−17. Commensurate optically based transfer methods are therefore needed. Here we demonstrate optical time–frequency transfer over free space via two-way exchange between coherent frequency combs, each phase-locked to the local optical oscillator. We achieve 1 fs timing deviation, residual instability below 1 × 10−18 at 1,000 s and systematic offsets below 4 × 10−19, despite frequent signal fading due to atmospheric turbulence or obstructions across the 2 km link. This free-space transfer can enable terrestrial links to support clock-based geodesy. Combined with satellite-based optical communications, it provides a path towards global-scale geodesy, high-accuracy time–frequency distribution and satellite-based relativity experiments.
abstract_cn: 高质量的时间频率信号在远程位置之间的传输支持了许多应用，包括精确导航和定时，基于时钟的大地测量，长基线干涉测量，相干雷达阵列，广义相对论和基本常数的测试，以及将来的重新定义。但是，当前的基于微波的时间频率传输不足以实现具有飞秒级定时抖动且精度低于1＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 < sup>＆＃8722; 17 。因此需要相应的基于光学的转移方法。在这里，我们通过相干频率梳之间的双向交换演示了光时间在自由空间上的频率传递，每个相梳都锁相到本地光振荡器。我们在1,000＆＃160; s处实现了1fs的定时偏差，低于1＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 ＆＃8722; 18 的残余不稳定性以及低于4＆ ＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 ＆＃8722; 19 ，尽管由于2 2 km链路上的大气湍流或障碍物而导致信号频繁衰落。这种自由空间传输可以使地面链路支持基于时钟的大地测量。与基于卫星的光通信相结合，它为实现全球大地测量，高精度时间频率分布和基于卫星的相对性实验提供了一条途径。

title: Quantum tele-amplification with a continuous-variable superposition state
title_cn: 具有连续可变叠加态的量子远距放大
abstract: Optical coherent states are classical light fields with high purity, and are essential carriers of information in optical networks. If these states could be controlled in the quantum regime, allowing for their quantum superposition (referred to as a Schrödinger-cat state), then novel quantum-enhanced functions such as coherent-state quantum computing (CSQC), quantum metrology and a quantum repeater could be realized in the networks. Optical cat states are now routinely generated in laboratories. An important next challenge is to use them for implementing the aforementioned functions. Here, we demonstrate a basic CSQC protocol, where a cat state is used as an entanglement resource for teleporting a coherent state with an amplitude gain. We also show how this can be extended to a loss-tolerant quantum relay of multi-ary phase-shift keyed coherent states. These protocols could be useful in both optical and quantum communications.
abstract_cn: 光学相干态是具有高纯度的经典光场，并且是光学网络中必不可少的信息载体。 如果可以在量子状态下控制这些状态，并考虑其量子叠加（称为Schr＆＃246; dinger-cat状态），那么新颖的量子增强功能，例如相干态量子计算（CSQC），量子计量学 在网络中可以实现量子中继器。 现在，通常在实验室中生成光学猫状态。 下一个重要的挑战是将它们用于实现上述功能。 在这里，我们演示了一种基本的CSQC协议，其中猫状态用作纠缠资源，用于以幅度增益传送相干状态。 我们还展示了如何将其扩展到多元相移键控相干态的容错量子中继。 这些协议在光通信和量子通信中都可能有用。

title: Real-time in vivo computed optical interferometric tomography
title_cn: 实时体内计算机光学干涉断层扫描
abstract: High-resolution real-time tomography of scattering tissues is important for many areas of medicine and biology. However, the compromise between transverse resolution and depth-of-field, in addition to low sensitivity deep in tissue, continues to impede progress towards cellular-level volumetric tomography. Computed imaging has the potential to solve these long-standing limitations. Interferometric synthetic aperture microscopy is a computed imaging technique enabling high-resolution volumetric tomography with spatially invariant resolution. However, its potential for clinical diagnostics remains largely untapped because full volume reconstructions required lengthy post-processing, and the phase-stability requirements have been difficult to satisfy in vivo. Here, we demonstrate how three-dimensional Fourier-domain resampling, in combination with high-speed optical coherence tomography, can achieve high-resolution in vivo tomography. Enhanced depth sensitivity was achieved over a depth of field extended in real time by more than an order of magnitude. This work lays the foundation for high-speed volumetric cellular-level tomography.
abstract_cn: 散射组织的高分辨率实时层析成像对医学和生物学的许多领域都很重要。然而，除了组织深处的低灵敏度之外，横向分辨率和景深之间的折衷还阻碍了向细胞水平体积层析成像的进展。计算机成像有可能解决这些长期存在的局限性。干涉式合成孔径显微镜是一种计算机成像技术，可实现具有空间不变分辨率的高分辨率体积层析成像。但是，其临床诊断潜力仍未得到充分利用，因为全体积重建需要漫长的后处理过程，而且相稳定性要求很难在体内得到满足。在这里，我们演示了三维傅里叶域重采样结合高速光学相干断层扫描如何实现高分辨率的体内断层扫描。在实时扩展超过一个数量级的景深上实现了更高的深度灵敏度。这项工作为高速体细胞层析成像奠定了基础。

title: Far-field imaging of non-fluorescent species with subdiffraction resolution
title_cn: 具有亚衍射分辨率的非荧光物质的远场成像
abstract: Super-resolution optical microscopy is providing a new means by which to view as yet unseen details on a nanoscopic scale. Current far-field super-resolution techniques rely on fluorescence as the readout. Here, we demonstrate a scheme for breaking the diffraction limit in far-field imaging of non-fluorescent species by using spatially controlled saturation of electronic absorption. Our method is based on a pump–probe process where a modulated pump field perturbs the charge carrier density in a sample, thus modulating the transmission of a probe field. A doughnut-shaped laser beam is then added to transiently saturate the electronic transition in the periphery of the focal volume, so the induced modulation in the sequential probe pulse only occurs at the focal centre. By raster-scanning the three collinearly aligned beams, high-speed subdiffraction-limited imaging of graphite nanoplatelets is performed. This technique has the potential to enable super-resolution imaging of nanomaterials and non-fluorescent chromophores, which may remain out of reach to fluorescence-based methods.
abstract_cn: 超分辨率光学显微镜提供了一种新的手段，通过它可以在纳米尺度上查看尚未见到的细节。当前的远场超分辨率技术依靠荧光作为读数。在这里，我们演示了通过使用电子吸收的空间受控饱和度来打破非荧光物质的远场成像中的衍射极限的方案。我们的方法基于泵浦过程，其中调制的泵浦场会扰动样品中的电荷载流子密度，从而调制探测场的传输。然后添加一个甜甜圈形的激光束，以使焦点区域周围的电子跃迁暂时饱和，因此顺序探测脉冲中的感应调制仅发生在焦点中心。通过光栅扫描三个共线对准的光束，对石墨纳米片进行了高速亚衍射极限成像。该技术有可能实现对纳米材料和非荧光发色团的超分辨率成像，而基于荧光的方法可能仍无法实现。

title: Subwavelength light focusing using random nanoparticles
title_cn: 使用随机纳米粒子的亚波长聚焦
abstract: There has been an escalation in interest in developing methods to control the near field because of its role in subwavelength optics. Many novel ideas have emerged in the field of plasmonics, super-resolution optical imaging and lithography, among others. However, the near field generated in plasmonic metamaterials is fundamentally restricted by their predesigned structure, and super-resolution optical techniques do not directly control the near field. Here, we achieve direct control of the optical near field by shaping the wavefront impinging on turbid media consisting of random nanoparticles. The linear relation between input far field and scattered output near fields allows us to coherently control the near field at arbitrary positions. Direct control of the near field through scattering control offers novel approaches for subwavelength optics and may have direct applications in bio- and nanophotonics.
abstract_cn: 由于其在亚波长光学中的作用，人们越来越关注开发控制近场的方法。 在等离子体，超分辨率光学成像和光刻领域中出现了许多新颖的思想。 然而，等离子体超材料中产生的近场从根本上受到其预先设计的结构的限制，并且超分辨率光学技术不能直接控制近场。 在这里，我们通过对入射到由随机纳米颗粒组成的混浊介质上的波前进行整形来实现对光学近场的直接控制。 输入远场与分散输出近场之间的线性关系使我们能够在任意位置相干地控制近场。 通过散射控制直接控制近场为亚波长光学提供了新颖的方法，并可能直接应用于生物和纳米光子学。

title: Charge-compensated, semiconducting single-walled carbon nanotube thin film as an electrically configurable optical medium
title_cn: 电荷补偿的半导体单壁碳纳米管薄膜作为可电配置的光学介质
abstract: A two-terminal semiconducting single-walled carbon nanotube (SC-SWNT) film in contact with an ionic liquid allows the realization of an extremely high density of holes, inducing a strong position-dependent electromodulation of the interband and excitonic transitions as a result of the position-dependent shift of the SWNT Fermi level. Electrical control of the optical transmission suggests applications of the SC-SWNT thin films as electrically configurable optical media, while the wide spectral range of the electro-optical modulation, which extends from the far-infrared to the visible, provides a viable approach to large-area electrochromic smart windows.
abstract_cn: 与离子液体接触的两端半导电单壁碳纳米管（SC-SWNT）膜可实现极高的空穴密度，从而引起带间跃迁和激子跃迁的位置依赖性强电调制，如 SWNT费米能级随位置变化的结果。 光学传输的电气控制建议将SC-SWNT薄膜用作可电配置的光学介质，而从远红外到可见光的电光调制的宽光谱范围则为大尺寸的应用提供了可行的方法。 区域电致变色智能窗户。

title: Analysis of enhanced light emission from highly strained germanium microbridges
title_cn: 高应变锗微桥增强的发光分析
abstract: Tensile strain is a widely discussed means for inducing a direct bandgap in Ge for the realization of a semiconductor laser compatible with Si microelectronics. We present a top-down fabrication approach for creating high uniaxial tensile stress in suspended Ge structures, which enhances—by a factor of more than 20—the strain induced by thermal mismatch of Ge layers grown on silicon or silicon-on-insulator substrates. Strain values up to 3.1% are measured using Raman spectroscopy, in excellent agreement with simulations using a biaxial thermal strain of 0.15%. As expected from the high value of strain, a 210 meV peak energy shift in the emission with respect to bulk Ge and a strong increase (×25) in the integrated photoluminescence intensity are observed. Although 3.1% uniaxial strain does not transform Ge into a direct-gap material, our model calculation predicts an optical gain of 460 cm−1 for 1 × 1019 cm−3 n-doped structures at an electron–hole injection density of 3 × 1019 cm−3.

title: Enhanced energy storage in chaotic optical resonators
title_cn: 混沌光谐振器中增强的能量存储
abstract: Chaos is a phenomenon that occurs in many aspects of contemporary science. In classical dynamics, chaos is defined as a hypersensitivity to initial conditions. The presence of chaos is often unwanted, as it introduces unpredictability, which makes it difficult to predict or explain experimental results. Conversely, we demonstrate here how chaos can be used to enhance the ability of an optical resonator to store energy. We combine analytic theory with ab initio simulations and experiments in photonic-crystal resonators to show that a chaotic resonator can store six times more energy than its classical counterpart of the same volume. We explain the observed increase by considering the equipartition of energy among all degrees of freedom of the chaotic resonator (that is, the cavity modes) and discover a convergence of their lifetimes towards a single value. A compelling illustration of the theory is provided by enhanced absorption in deformed polystyrene microspheres.
abstract_cn: 混沌是在当代科学的许多方面都发生的现象。 在经典动力学中，混沌被定义为对初始条件的超敏感性。 混乱的存在通常是不希望有的，因为它引入了不可预测性，这使得难以预测或解释实验结果。 相反，我们在这里演示如何使用混沌来增强光谐振器存储能量的能力。 我们将解析理论与从头算模拟和光子晶体谐振器中的实验相结合，表明混沌谐振器可以存储比同等体积的经典谐振器多六倍的能量。 我们通过考虑混沌谐振器所有自由度（即腔模）之间的能量均分来解释观察到的增加，并发现它们的寿命趋于单一值。 变形聚苯乙烯微球的吸收增强为该理论提供了令人信服的说明。

title: Polymer bulk heterojunction solar cells employing Förster resonance energy transfer
title_cn: 利用Förster共振能量转移的聚合物本体异质结太阳能电池
abstract: There are two crucial tasks for realizing high-efficiency polymer solar cells (PSCs): increasing the range of the spectral absorption of light and efficiently harvesting photogenerated excitons. Here, we describe Förster resonance energy transfer-based heterojunction polymer solar cells that incorporate squaraine dye. The high absorbance of squaraine in the near-infrared region broadens the spectral absorption of the solar cells and assists in developing an ordered nanomorphology for enhanced charge transport. Femtosecond spectroscopic studies reveal highly efficient (up to 96%) excitation energy transfer from poly(3-hexylthiophene) to squaraine occurring on a picosecond timescale. We demonstrate a 38% increase in power conversion efficiency to reach 4.5%, and suggest that this system has improved exciton migration over long distances. This architecture transcends traditional multiblend systems, allowing multiple donor materials with separate spectral responses to work synergistically, thereby enabling an improvement in light absorption and conversion. This opens up a new avenue for the development of high-efficiency polymer solar cells.
abstract_cn: 实现高效聚合物太阳能电池（PSC）有两个关键任务：增加光的光谱吸收范围和有效地收集光生激子。在这里，我们描述了结合方酸染料的基于F＆r共振能量转移的异质结聚合物太阳能电池。在近红外区域中，方酸的高吸光度拓宽了太阳能电池的光谱吸收范围，并有助于形成有序的纳米形态，以增强电荷传输。飞秒光谱研究表明，在皮秒级的时间范围内，高效的（高达96％）激发能量从聚（3-己基噻吩）转移到方酸。我们证明了功率转换效率提高了38％，达到4.5％，并表明该系统改善了激子在长距离上的迁移。该架构超越了传统的多混合系统，允许具有不同光谱响应的多种施主材料协同工作，从而改善了光的吸收和转换。这为高效聚合物太阳能电池的开发开辟了一条新途径。

title: Efficient inorganic–organic hybrid heterojunction solar cells containing perovskite compound and polymeric hole conductors
title_cn: 含有钙钛矿化合物和聚合物空穴导体的高效无机-有机混合异质结太阳能电池
abstract: Inorganic–organic hybrid structures have become innovative alternatives for next-generation dye-sensitized solar cells, because they combine the advantages of both systems. Here, we introduce a layered sandwich-type architecture, the core of which comprises a bicontinuous three-dimensional nanocomposite of mesoporous (mp)-TiO2, with CH3NH3PbI3 perovskite as light harvester, as well as a polymeric hole conductor. This platform creates new opportunities for the development of low-cost, solution-processed, high-efficiency solar cells. The use of a polymeric hole conductor, especially poly-triarylamine, substantially improves the open-circuit voltage Voc and fill factor of the cells. Solar cells based on these inorganic–organic hybrids exhibit a short-circuit current density Jsc of 16.5 mA cm−2, Voc of 0.997 V and fill factor of 0.727, yielding a power conversion efficiency of 12.0% under standard AM 1.5 conditions.

title: Experimental observation of the optical spin–orbit torque
title_cn: 光学自旋轨道扭矩的实验观察
abstract: Electrical and optical control of magnetization are of central importance in the research and applications of spintronics. Non-relativistic angular momentum transfer or relativistic spin–orbit coupling provide efficient means by which electrical current driven through a ferromagnet can exert a torque on the magnetization. Ferromagnetic semiconductors like (Ga,Mn)As are suitable model systems with which to search for optical counterparts of these phenomena, where photocarriers excited by a laser pulse exert torque upon magnetization. Here, we report the observation of an optical spin–orbit torque (OSOT) in (Ga,Mn)As. The phenomenon originates from spin–orbit coupling of non-equilibrium photocarriers excitated by helicity-independent pump laser pulses, which do not impart angular momentum. In our measurements of the time-dependent magnetization trajectories, the signatures of OSOT are clearly distinct from the competing thermal excitation mechanism, and OSOT can even dominate in (Ga,Mn)As materials with appropriately controlled micromagnetic parameters.
abstract_cn: 磁化的电子和光学控制在自旋电子学的研究和应用中至关重要。非相对论角动量传递或相对论自旋轨道耦合提供了有效的手段，通过该手段，通过铁磁体驱动的电流可以在磁化强度上施加扭矩。像（Ga，Mn）As这样的铁磁半导体是合适的模型系统，可用于寻找这些现象的光学对应物，其中由激光脉冲激发的光载体在磁化时会施加扭矩。在这里，我们报告了在（Ga，Mn）As中的光学自旋轨道转矩（OSOT）的观察结果。该现象源于不依赖于螺旋度的泵浦激光脉冲激发的非平衡光载流子的自旋轨道耦合，该旋转不赋予角动量。在我们测量随时间变化的磁化轨迹时，OSOT的特征明显不同于竞争的热激励机制，并且OSOT甚至可以在具有适当控制的微磁参数的（Ga，Mn）As材料中占主导地位。
